# Task-Based Information Professional Services
[Title in official language of bid country, if necessary]

**Tender Announcement Details**
====================================

* **Reference Number:** cb-5938-18173222
* **Solicitation Number:** ECGZ-RFP-2020-0716-A
* **Publication Date:** 2023-05-29
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-07-06T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-08-15
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2026-03-31

**Bid Opportunities Description**
-----------------------------------

Elections Canada seeks Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) suppliers to provide on-demand IT professional services to support ongoing activities and initiatives in the National Capital Region. The supplier will provide a range of services, including:

* Cyber Security Services (Levels 2 and 3)
* Telecommunications Services (Levels 2 and 3)

**Eligibility**
----------------

This bid is open to Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement Holders under EN578-170432 for the following categories:

* Cyber Security Services:
	+ Information Technology Security Methodology, Policy and Procedures Analyst (Level 3)
	+ Information Technology Security TRA and C&A Analyst (Level 3)
	+ Information Technology Security Engineer (Level 3)
	+ Incident Management Specialist (Level 3)
	+ Computer Forensic Specialist (Level 3)
	+ Privacy Impact Assessment Specialist (Level 3)
* Telecommunications Services:
	+ Telecommunication Technician (Level 3)
	+ Telecommunication System specialist (Level 3)

**Security**
------------

Minimum corporate security required: DOS - Reliability
Minimum resource security required: Reliability status
Exigence relative à la sécurité: Commonwealth PS SRCL #19

**Contract Period**
------------------

The Contract period will be from the Effective Date and ends three years later (the "Initial Term").
The Contractor will grant to Elections Canada irrevocable options to extend the period of the Contract by 3 additional periods of 2 years each under the same terms and conditions.

**Proposal Submission**
-----------------------

Proposal submissions must be addressed to the attention of the Contracting Authority and delivered, sealed, to the Proposal Receiving Unit on or before the bid closing date and time indicated on the front page of the Request for Proposal (RFP) document.
